description: These spiced black bean tostadas are packed with veggie goodness and can be ready in minutes.
name: Smoky Black Bean Tostadas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 limes, juice of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Brush the tortillas with half of the oil and place on a foil-lined baking tray. Bake for 8 minutes, until crisp.

Heat the rest of the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and spiced and cook for 2 minutes. Add the lime juice, maple syrup and beans and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Remove from the heat and mash the beans with the back of a fork to a coarse mix.
Spread each tostada with the black bean mix. Scatter with jalapenos and chopped coriander and serve with lime wedges.
